review: The internal specs are awesome. The speed of navigation and quick processing was nice. However the user interface format was not to my preferences having come from the Roku 2 and Roku 3.

review: Love it just wish prime offered newer movies

review: I am was not sure of streaming ?( old school cable guy ) love it worth the extra money than stick,to be able to talk and request movies tried the 30 Day  trial .I am going to join very happy .would recommend to others

review: love it...works as described...i can now watch HD cable in my man cave without adding an extra box from my cable company...

review: It doesn't make any sense to spend $100.00 for a product most of us already have in our pockets. (Smart phone). Why not just spend $12 bucks for a USB to hdmi adapter and connect your smartphones, lap tops, tablets etc; directly to your tv's. You guys are pretty dumb.
